title: Armor HUD
description: Minecraft mod that displays the durability of your armor on your screen. To the left of your offhand slot, you will see the durability of your helmet, chestplate, leggings, and boots.

title: Elytra Swapper
description: A Minecraft mod that uses a keybind to swap chestplate and elytra for quick switching between flight and defense.

title: FloatWeb
description: FloatWeb is a web development agency that specializes in creating modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites for businesses and individuals.
